A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The film has a genuinely intriguing heart buried in scattershot\, tone-deaf humor\, distractingly lazy writing\, cheap tension\, and a disheartening departure from the series' attention to detail and immersion. The film\, unlike the rest in the series\, is not an experience\, but a clear\, albeit still somewhat enjoyable\, cash grab. The Last Jedi makes me very concerned for the franchise's future as it lacks the heart and magic that made me fall in love with Star Wars.
